title: Diversity Enhancement Education Program Through Surgical Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic leadership concepts and general understanding of diversity in healthcare
context.additional_context: Blended education course combining Problem-Based Learning (PBL) and the ADDIE model, focusing on leadership development and diversity enhancement competencies in surgical fields

learning_goals: Apply diversity-respecting leadership in team-based problem-solving scenarios
Analyze DEI (Diversity, Equity, Inclusion) issues in medical settings and propose solutions
Design small-scale educational modules following the ADDIE model stages
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
